_source.text: 2 1/2 tbsp ghirardelli hazelnut hot chocolate, 15g of mini marshmallows then slide in 1 Ghirardelli's Dark Chocolate/Sea Salt Square in and when you get to the end, that last drink is better than sex baby!

text: Ghirardelli's Dark Chocolate/Sea **Salt** Square in and when you get to the end, that last drink **is** **better** **than** sex baby!
2 1/2 tbsp ghirardelli hazelnut hot chocolate, 15g of mini marshmallows then **slide** in 1

_source.text: A big slide with rocks to climb to reach the top, can't get much better than that.

text: A big **slide** with rocks to **climb** to reach the top, can't get much **better** **than** that.
